content: Hi, I'm afraid I won't be able to be part of this working group. With Mozilla's layoffs and restructuring, I won't be able to work directly on rustc from now on :(
@njn hey mate, it was great seeing you. I hope you can still hang out in the Zulip from time to time, and if not, godspeed! :heart:️
:sad: thanks for all the work you’ve done, all the best of the future
@njn very sad news, your accomplishments have been invaluable, thanks so much for all you’ve done
@njn Thanks for all the hard work! I've especially loved reading the quarterly(?) blog posts.
@njn :sad: :sad: :sad:, thanks for all your work you've done, wish you the best in your future and hope at some point in time you can be back doing your amazing stuff
